hero.title: Elevating Talent Through Refined Artistry
hero.subtitle: Discover excellence in casting with Laberge Casting
hero.description: We elevate talent through refined artistry and sophisticated casting solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At Laberge Casting, we believe in the power of exceptional talent and refined artistry. Our mission is to connect extraordinary individuals with opportunities that showcase their unique abilities.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer comprehensive casting services tailored to meet the diverse needs of our clients and talent.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Explore our collection of successful casting projects and collaborations.

talent.title: Talent
talent.description: Meet the exceptional individuals who make up our diverse talent roster.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our team to discuss your casting needs or to join our talent roster.
